course_title: Writing and Inquiry in the Liberal Arts: No Theme/Student's Choice
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 16 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0 of 6
course_description: Introduction to writing and inquiry in the liberal arts, with attention to variations across disciplines and rhetorical situations. Intensive practice in academic reading, writing, and research. Guidance in writing strategies and processes for diverse purposes and genres. First-year writing requirement.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in Faculty Tech Dev Center
